Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this exceptional product at an exclusive price of $200. It's an opportunity to elevate your current situation with something truly special. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further details about how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
